title: Wellness cottage with IR-sauna, bedstay, bathtub, river view & parking
description: You immediately feel at home in one of the seven spacious and attractively furnished houses . So put your phone for a change in the offline bird cage at the entrance, go for a long dinner or dream away while swinging in the rattan hanging chair by the fireplace. You can relax in these unique and just renovated workers' homes. This location directly on the Amstel also offers many opportunities for entertainment outside the door.Do you want to spend a romantic weekend together with your partner, chatting with friends, discovering the area on a bicycle which you can rent at the property or finally bringing the whole family together again? Treat yourself to an overnight stay at this fine location with private parking in front of the door.The floorplan of the houses are completely open. There are no doors separating the rooms. This means that there is an open bathroom and bedroom.On the ground floor is the living room. Because of the high ceilings and many windows the living room is wonderfully light. You have views over the Amstel from the living room. The living is equipped with a 3 seater sofa, which folds out into a sofa bed, TV, dining table, electric fireplace, rattan hanging chair and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a 2-burner electric stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, Nespresso coffee machine, kettle, crockery and kitchen utensils.

title: Family cottage (royal) with bathtub, river view & parking
description: You immediately feel at home in one of the seven spacious and attractively furnished houses of Adam The Second. So put your phone for a change in the offline bird cage at the entrance, go for a long dinner or dream away while swinging in the rattan hanging chair by the fireplace. You can relax in these unique and just renovated workers' homes. This location directly on the Amstel also offers many opportunities for entertainment outside the door.Do you want to spend a romantic weekend together with your partner, chatting with friends, discovering the area on a bicycle which you can rent at the property or finally bringing the whole family together again? Treat yourself to an overnight stay at this fine location with private parking in front of the door.The floorplan of the houses are completely open. There are no doors separating the rooms other than the toilet. This means that there is an open bathroom and bedroom.

title: Woodland cabin in Stoke Newington, Central London.
description: The Woodland Cabin is unique - a delightful spacious cabin, with wi-fi, kitchenette, in Central London, set within its own pretty woodland and featuring a private terrace. INDEPENDENT 24/7 ACCESS. Secure and safe. As you will see from our guest reviews, the cabin is an oasis of tranquility, but with easy access to the bright lights of Soho theatre-land and funky Dalston & Shoreditch. You will adore it! The cabin sleeps 2 people. The large double bed is exceptionally comfortable. For guests that prefer 2 single beds, we can arrange this without difficulty. We can also provide a child’s bed for a baby or toddler. The cabin is safe, secure and independently accessed, so you're free to come and go as you please.

title: Dalla Patty- Intero appartamento
description: Appartamento al primo piano di casa singola, ingresso indipendente, zona tranquilla, servita da mezzi pubblici, nelle vicinanze strada statale e autostrade. In zona supermercati, ristoranti.Confortevole e luminoso appartamento mansardato, composto da soggiorno, cucina camera da letto e bagno. La camera con un letto matrimoniale e uno singolo. Possibilità di aggiungere un altro letto singolo.Cucina accessoriata. Biancheria da bagno e da letto fornita. Parcheggi in prossimità dell'alloggio. Altre cose da tenere a mente a disposizione dei miei ospiti macchina del caffè con cialde, e pasticceria casalinga di benvenuto. Al check in verranno richiesti i documenti degli ospiti per assolvere alle pratiche previste dalla normativa vigente
